ComicInfo.Summary:
Rufferto's Four Scents: After three false leads, Rufferto's keen sense of smell eventually leads him to Groo.
Gods Against Groo Chapter 3: The quartet of corrupt priests of Diothos plan to undermine the people’s faith in Groo as a god, in order to convert them to worship Diothos. Divine Groo continues his endless fray against the other gods. The Minstrel's daughter appeals to the Queen of Iberza to spare her father’s life and is thrown into the dungeon, joining her father and many other prisoners. With a shipload of soldiers, the Sage lands on the island and is dismayed to find that the inhabitants worship Groo. Groo simultaneously frays against the two opposing factions of the island.
